body.name: Anker PowerConf C200 2K Webcam With Microphone for Laptop, Computer Camera, Web Camera with AI-Noise Canceling Mics, Stereo Mics, Adjustable Field of View, Low-Light Correction, Built-In Privacy Cover

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

features: Make a Good Impression -The 2K ultra-clear resolution on this Mac Webcam brings sharp clarity to every meeting. Be seen by your peers or impress your boss with your high-quality video calls.
Built-In Privacy Cover - Your privacy is important to us. When not in use, you can slide on the built-in privacy cover to shield yourself from the Mac Webcam’s view.

Versatile Field of View -Adjust how much the Mac Webcam can see by choosing the angle of the lens’s opening. Without losing any image quality, you can pick from 65°, 78°, or 95° to show just your face or include what’s behind you.
Look Nice in Any Light -The larger aperture size captures more light so that even without a ring light in low-light settings, you can still look bright and professional with this computer camera.
body.description: Plug and Play: Convenient and easy to set up, this USB Webcam is always ready for your meetings. USB-2.0: Connect your Mac Webcam to your computer using the included USB-A cable. Keep the Focus on You: Auto-focus takes less than 0.5 seconds to adjust to keep you, or your presentation, clear and the center of attention. AnkerWork Software: The accompanying software simplifies controls and integrates settings all into one application. Adjust the computer camera’s angles, download updates, and more from the software. One-Step Setup: Easily clip PowerConf C200 to the top of your desktop monitor. Compatible with All: This Mac Webcam can be connected and used with all leading platforms. Note: The AnkerWork software only supports Windows 7/8/10/11 and Mac OS 10.14 and above. Anker PowerConf C200 can only be used with Windows 7/8/10/11 or Mac OS 10.13 and above.

productInformation.value: 4.4 4.4 out of 5 stars 133 ratings 4.4 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does everything right. Great deal.
reviews.reviewText: I ordered a used camera, which looked like it was barely used. worked perfectly. the picture quality is great. the colors might not look as natural as the Logitech C920 but they can be adjusted. overall, great webcam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great webcam for the price
reviews.reviewText: I love the highly visible manual lens cover, the picture quality, and the adjustable FOV. The fact that you can't have the ankerworks software running to adjust settings while in a call on another platform is a bit annoying, but it does seem to retain settings. Overall, very happy with this item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Small and efficient… great video/picture quality
reviews.reviewText: This little camera works excellent! Love the built in privacy shadow to turn off the camera lenses. It does have software to change the angle of the camera but that software can’t be open if you are using the camera with a different program, such as Zoom. So that severely limits the ability to use some of the features. Love the camera, wish it had the software that I could control the image while using it with another application.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Picture is super clear
reviews.reviewText: The picture is super clear and is similar quality to cameras that are double the price. Auto-focus works well and the design is great. Wish they had a white version

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mic and picture quality. Compatible with no outside drivers
reviews.reviewText: Bought this when my laptop camera stopped working. Zoom and Microsoft Teams instantly recognized this camera/mic when I plugged it in. It's reliably great quality for voice and video. My only small concern is that the camera is slow at refocusing when it goes out of focus (which is rare).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good quality.
reviews.reviewText: I use this to record videos, take some pictures and video meetings. For those purposes the resolution is suitable and the idea that you can close the camera with a slider is a peace of mind.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Webcam out there. Excellent picture quality, well build microphone is super.
reviews.reviewText: The camera provides a great picture. I have a large window behind my desk, and the camera balances the light perfectly, and so I no longer have a red face. The privacy shield is super and blocks the camera usage when not wanted.The camera microphone works well for conferences, but I always recommend a separate speaker microphone combo like the Anke S500.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great quality. Wish Anker made video capture software with it
reviews.reviewText: I bought this when my logitech cameara started to die. I love the zoom and quality of it. Great quality, especially when zooming in. However, I wish Anker's software allowed for video recording. You have to find a 3rd party software to record video, unlike Logitech.I love the built-in camera lens closer as well. The privacy function is great.
Seamless install and the image capture is great

Tolle Plug and Play Kamera, die direkt nach dem einstecken erkannt wird und z.B. mit Teams genutzt werden kann. Kollegen im Chat bemerken die deutlich bessere Auflösung als die Laptop interne Kamera. Wirkt somit in Konferenzen deutlich professioneller. Hilfreich ist die Software von Anker mit der man die Auflösung, die Art des Weitwinkels etc. einstellen kann. Einfache Montage und Ausrichtung am Bildschirm möglich. Typische Anker Qualität. Lediglich der Autofokus reagiert manchmal träge, wenn man sich stark in der Tiefe bewegt. Für mich aber kein Problem, deshalb trotzdem volle Sterne.
Super zufrieden, tolle Qualität, USB-C Anschluss, Gutes Mikrophon, alles Top! Autofokus nicht so toll, einfach ausschalten und manuell im AnkerWork-Programm an Sitzposition anpassen!

reviews.reviewTitle: Not sure if it is a faulty unit - constant ticking during video call
reviews.reviewText: Bought this unit based on positive reviews. Arrived in pristine condition, couldn't tell this was a renewed product.Installed it on a desk mounted stand, updated the firmware and installed the AnkerWorks software (without it it has a really wide viewing angle that I find unsuitable for videoconferencing. If you're getting this to elevate your Zoom, Teams or Viber calls kame sure your IT allows the installation of the software. My corp environment does not allow it, so I can't avoid the wide angle.On my personal computer was faced with an issue that requires me to return the camera. During a video call there is an annoying ticking noise that is heard both from my side and from the other participants.I do hope that this is due to the fact I got a renewed unit (failed to notice that to be honest).In terms of image quality it was a very nice webcam with good contrast and accurate flesh tones.If you can get the software installed and you can switch to a narrower viewing angle, and your unit doesn't suffer from the ticking issue, all in all, a very capable webcam.
Die Bildübertragung ist super, die Tonalität ist ebenfalls gut. Kann ich nur empfehlen.
